item.description:
So, to be fair, we need to give equal time to the white wines (and the white wine lovers). Tuesday, July 14 is Bastille Day. What better place to celebrate than at a sleek French wine bar in Boston with a sampling of sauvignon blanc wines! One of my personal favorites. Join me for a fun evening on the town in a cool place enjoying fine wine and food.

Wine tastings are Tuesday nights at 7 pm. Four or five wines are offered along with food. The cost is $30 per person, tax & tip included, unless otherwise indicated below. This Meet-Up must be paid in advance. Payment must be made by Friday, July 10 or your RSVP will be changed to no. I will provide payment information as we get closer to the date. The price will be slightly more ($1-$2) due to the Amazon.com transaction fee.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the wine tasting room

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Sauvignon Blanc Tasting at Les Zygomates - Bastille Day
